title: The Pioneers
creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
brief_description: Frederick McCubbin’s melancholy paintings of the hardships of life in the bush in the early days. The ballad accompaniment written by Tim Burstall, music by Carl Ogden, and sung by Glen Tomasetti and Paul Marks.
creator_credit_for_label: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
